response.overview: A short film by a couple of friends!!!!! We have yet to decide the title... and write the script... and film the whole thing... but it will be lots of fun and you all should tune in for more and pray for us that it is finished by the end of the summer (or at least October)
response.tagline: does for horror shorts what jaws did to the ocean or... something
response.title: Untitled Horror Short Project
